title: Glen Echo Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Glen Echo   2 Photos  In 1889 when two brothers, Edwin and Edward Baltzley, purchased land along the Potomac River. They envisioned a suburban community rising on a picturesque. The Baltzleys considered it the perfect setting for the well-to-do and well-connected.
